original_title: Grama Niladhari Service completes 60 years since inauguration
original_body_lines: President Ranil Wickremesinghe today extended his congradulations all Grama Niladhari Officers who have served in the past and present, towards improving the lives of the people, in view of the Grama Niladhari Service completing 60 years since its inauguration, the President’s Media Division (PMD) reported.
